caption: The image is sourced from GoogleEarth and shows an aerial view of an area with a train station. The train station is in the center of the image, extending vertically with a long structure that is identifiable by multiple parallel lines representing the tracks and platforms.

objects.referring_sentence: The train station in the center of the image.

qa_pairs.question: What is the main structure visible in the center of the image?
What feature identifies the object as a train station?
How many train stations are visible in the image?
Are there any other prominent structures besides the train station?
Does the train station extend across the entire image?
